snippet: The officer commanding United Nations monitors said the fighting made it impossible for his unarmed observers to resume their mission.
lead_paragraph: The officer commanding United Nations monitors said the fighting made it impossible for his unarmed observers to resume their mission.

headline.seo: Syria Violence Is ‘Unprecedented’, U.N. Commander Says
